com.aos.zxing4processing
Class ZXING4P

java.lang.Object
  com.aos.zxing4processing.ZXING4P

public class ZXING4P
extends java.lang.Object

This library was created to integrate into processing v1.0 the wonderful barcode decoding library called ZXING that you can find n google code here
http://code.google.com/p/zxing/

So no big deal was created by me, apart from the integration process. Which is also very limited in scope.

That's why I am releasing this code with no licensing whatsoever. Do what you want with it, but please respect the licensing of the ZXINg libraries: you can find it in their software distribution packages. Please read it all up.

As for this small library: feel free and encouraged to make it better and more functional.

And please send me a note if you do something with it, as I'd love to see it and publish it over at Art is Open Source.

Best, xDxD.vs.xDxD@gmail.com
http://www.artisopensource.net

Rolf van Gelder :: http://www.cage.nl/ :: http://www.cagewebdev.com/
29/05/2010 - Disabled system.out output
03/28/2010 - Recompiled it for Processing 1.1
07/26/2009 - Added encoding support: generateQRCode(str,width,height)
    Will generate a PImage with the encoded QRCode image
07/26/2009 - Added decodeImage(boolean tryharder,PImage img)
    Decodes the QRCode directly from a PImage instead of from a disk file

generateQRCode

public processing.core.PImage generateQRCode(java.lang.String content,
                                             int width,
                                             int height)
Generates a QRCode image from a string (added by: Rolf van Gelder)

Parameters:
content - string to encode
width - width of the PImage that will be returned
height - height of the PImage that will be returned
Returns:
PImage with the QRCode image

decodeImage

public java.lang.String decodeImage(boolean tryHarder,
                                    processing.core.PImage img)
Decode the QRCode from a PImage (added by: Rolf van Gelder)

Parameters:
tryHarder - if set to true, it tells the software to spend a little more time trying to decode the image
img - PImage containing the image to be examinded
Returns:
String with the found QRCode (empty if nothing found)

decode

public java.util.Vector decode(boolean tryHarder,
                               java.lang.String uri)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
Decode the image of the barcode found at the passed uri

Parameters:
tryHarder - if set to true, it tells the software to spend a little more time trying to decode the image
uri - the String contains the URI of the image conaining the barcode to decode
Returns:
a Vector containing the Strings found in the barcode, or an empty Vector if nothing was decoded
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

decodeWeb

public java.util.Vector decodeWeb(boolean tryHarder,
                                  java.lang.String uri,
                                  java.net.URL codeBase)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
Decode the image of the barcode found at the passed uri. This version of the method can be used inside an Applet. Remember that java applets can only read in the same domain on which is the web page containing them.

Parameters:
tryHarder - if set to true, it tells the software to spend a little more time trying to decode the image
uri - the String contains the URI of the image conaining the barcode to decode
codeBase - the codebase of the applet on which the program is running
Returns:
a Vector containing the Strings found in the barcode, or an empty Vector if nothing was decoded
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

dispose

public void dispose()
